title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 163.13 - Advertising
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 163.13 - Advertising

State Regulations
(a) Approved entities may not: (1)
make or publish any false or misleading
statement or material omission regarding employment opportunities which may be
available as a result of the successful completion of a course or as a result
of acquisition of a nail specialist trainee registration; (2)
make or publish any false or misleading
statement or material omission regarding enrollment of current or former
students as inducement to obtain enrollment of new students; (3)
make or publish any other false or
misleading statement or material omission as inducement to obtain enrollment of
new students. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
163.13

Adopted

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
